review: If you want to relax and play for the sake of communication with friends then this game is for you. It has everything from bugs to desynchrony . The game is cool but not for everyone.As for me it is worthy occupied a niche in the gaming industry and no wonder it is considered a pioneer in the Battle Royale . Many games immediately began to introduce the same Riga games in their games. I think as stated by the respected developers of this very game if they will continue to improve this game it will play. And you can add a lot to this game...From new guns to new modes. But they should also think about the players first of all and not only about the income of the game.After all if the game will be more accessible to players with a weak computer hardware and players will be more.... Well accordingly there will be more players who are at least small but part of the profit will bring. As a player from Russia I would like them to pay attention to the fact that the RCN in connection with the struggle with the social network of Telegrams there are some difficulties when entering the game namely the match itself is not loaded.And I think this problem is present not only in me which requires the use of VPN because of which the ultimate high ping which is not reverent to a good game as someone less ping he will have an advantage. What I would like to say about the game as a whole. The game is good the mode is good there is something to develop it but such moments as VPN fps drawdown and how the player gets into( not understandable damage) spoil the overall picture of the game. I think the game at the moment if you count on a five point scale has 3.5 points.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

I have a decent PC and this is THE ONLY game that experiences some sort of screen tearing and lag even when everything is changed to low settings every other demanding title works perfectly on high settings. I can't recommend this game as this is very desappointing it is not playable for me. The atmosphere however that this game creates can definitely be felt and it is a good shooter for players who want something more 'realistic'. So the soul of the game is well presented but the practical side of it is absolutely trash. Please fix the optimization!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Got a lot of game crash issue with no reason but the worst thing ever is "desync issue" that unplayable in the early to mid game which I can't win the 1v1 fight even my spray shots already hit the enemy on my screen(with blood spread) but from the death cam reveal that no damage taken on enemy or just a couple shots hit. Too many complaints about this issue and a lot of patches updated but no sign of this problem to be solved. This is not a "free to play" game so please listen to customer and fix the priority problem not just only improve the in game ux/ui.Hopefully they fix the serious issue soon for the remain player.For me I'm done for this game.

review: Game has severe issues with hackers. Game runs a BattleEye anti cheat (this AC literally does not work I played ARK SE and it runs the same anti cheat I would constantly have Chinese hackers spawning instakilling dinos on almost all the official servers this is corroborated by many many reviews at the time). Game has terrible performance issues. Once again I'll mention ARK SE. ARK is in no way shape or form optimized. Yet I can run that on Ultra with my current specs. I can run PUBG on low with the help of an optimization guide and my temperatures go WAY up. I don't have this issue with any other Steam title I own (300+ atm) I don't have this issue when rendering 3D animations or HD videos either. The developer has a distinct lack of morals. He lets hackers run rampant and chooses to instead divert more attention into banning those who kill popular streamers or letsplayers instead. Gameplay is very similar to H1Z1 infact it's almost a complete 1 1 if you don't factor in a few things. Instead of the much needed optimization being done it's instead been chosen to make a console port even though it barely runs on some high end machines without severe tweaks.Save your money if you can. I got it discounted by almost 30% via Humble Bundle and it's in no fit state yet and by the developers current actions it will be another one of them EA titles that either stays EA for the foreseeable future or is pushed into a stable full launch dispite not being stable or complete.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! All jokes aside this is my personal review on Playerunknown's Battlegrounds which I love this ing game and spend hours playing it. Positive things about PUBG *Endless fun with your friends or even random people playing on the Zombie mode or War mode.*2 large maps + 2 smaller maps (more to come) which allow people to chose faster or longer timed games.*Various guns weapon attachments vehicles clothing and much more.*Graphics are pretty awesome and unique considering other games don't look like this.*Devs are willing to listen to community feedback eg They removed the grenade feature literally pushed players away.*Lobby music is ing amazing.*Top played game on steam meaning you'll always have people to play with.*Lots more awesome things which you can find out from other people...*All your stats are tracked and tell you how many people you've killed longest shot etc..*Games always depend on your team's choices and how you counter other players.*FOR 3 maps and more maps to come AWESOME CLOTHES GUNS AND LOOT VEHICLES GAME MODES You should buy PUBG! people said it would die and look at it it's beat CSGO H1Z1 DOTA2 League of legends(Even though that game is a dota thief.) Negative things about PUBG *If you have a low spec PC then you'll struggle on Low/Medium.*If your hard drive isn't running well or is slow then you'll struggle with rendering stuff in faster than other players eg Buildings and yes LOOT.*If your motherboard is dying you'll run this game like a turd on ultra low settings which isn't nice.*Game is optimized as well as it should be but the devs are working on it.*Physics aren't the best for example if you hit a plastic chair with a car then it'll be like smashing into a 4000 inch wall of concrete.*The slight kiss of a car hitting you will do some serious damage and most likely 'knock' you out to the floor.*Memeory errors/leaks everywhere. You could be enjoying your day driving and boom you get nice white box with a red cross.From the first time I've played PUBG to the present time now I can say the game has had a roller coaster of development getting better and worse but overall it is improving. I recommend you buy PUBG so that they get sales and I get free merch from Bluehole )*Terrible server issues causing you to still take bullet damage whilst in 100% cover.*Shroud quit

( You see i was quite irritated as i hadn't had my morning cofee) I can't remember what he said not that i could understand anything he was saying through that stupid retard accent of his but as soon as he said what he said i pulled out my Bayonet and began jabbing it into his body over and over again What can i say it gave me temporary euphoria something everyone enjoys but this this was something else he screamed for help but no one else was going to be up this late. Before he died I decided to pull out my military grade Colt M19 11 and press my steaming barrel against his temple i uttered these words from my dip filled mouth " ing retard indian" i pulled the trigger and killed him and consumed his remains out in the desert. Blamed his death on ISIS. OMEGALUL.

review: I usually don't review many games but i've invested a large amount of time and money into this game hoping like everyone else that Bluehole will make this game as great as it could be. I'll go into further detail.I purchased this game when it was very new and i uninstalled it very shortly after a few hours of playing or attempting to. The game was terribly optimized and most of the time nothing would render if you were able to drop.Came back a few months later after like 8 patches or so and gave it another shot. I reintalled because alot of my friends were playing it so i went for it again and the game was still pretty laggy low fps poor bullet registration issues with objects not rendering and just normal early access issues that would eventaully be fixed when the full game came out. Pc release comes out 1.0 launch game is still just a hot pile of garbage and actually almost runs worse with more problems then early access build???I won't go into detail about all the things i hate about this game because there is a lot this company has made it super clear what there intentions around based on there actions over the last year. They launched a half made piece of trash on pc and refuse to fix it. They then launch a even worse pile of trash for Xbox and its still a broken pile of trash. review: Since the release of micro transactions the game has become awash with hackers looking to make money selling crates.For some countries the amount of money they can make far outstrips the cost of buying the game if they get caught. Bluehole seem un capeable of handling this large influx of hackers.In a game that has 100 players in any given match this makes the game incredible frustraiting. You will now most likly come across a hacker yourself every few games.This was NOT the case before they fully implimented micro transactions.The game is still great fun in Duo's or Squads where the hackers rarly show up (as it's not a time effective way to farm crates). But near unplayable curently in single player.August 2017

review: This game proves that a fresh gameplay idea is more important than graphics and that new IPs can be wildly successful despite it not being the smoothest experience.This is one of the few games in my life where the gameplay is so immersive and engaging that recapping the matches the next day with friends brings the excitement right back and makes me look forward to playing again. That is game of the year material and for that I highly recommend it.With such a bright spotlight Blue Hole/PUBG Corp had a chance to redefine the entire gaming industry. Instead they re solidified the awful tactics that is the abyss that the industry is sliding into. Instead of showing AAA publishers that you can still make hundreds of millions of dollars without gimmicks they decided that it wasn't enough and just had to cram lootboxes (gambling) into the game.The greed of in game monetization that is leaking from the mobile app ecosystem will ruin gaming and gamers are doing it to themselves.

review: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS aka PUBG or Angry russian royale is a game like no other and I know it's like H1Z1 and other games like in that genre but it doesn't feel like I'm playing one of those kind of games (Not saying I don't enjoy them games as well)The game in my opinion is most enjoyable when playing squads which is you and 3 of your friends or random russians. The reason this is more enjoyable then duo or solo is because you can annoy the hell out of your degenarate friends and get them killed by firing a shot while hiding from other sqauds and the salt and the screams among your dying friends is rather satisfying.The lobby is probably the most annoying but best part about this game. Hearing people shout in fake indian accents and then popping you constanly in the head. Or my personal fav when you shout I'm a snake down the mic and prone and crawl around starting a line of other players shouting the same line acousticly as you.So if you actually want to win a game then I have some pro tips from the pro himself which is myself and trust me I'm one of the best players in the EU region with a whopping KD ratio of 0.36.Here are the pro tips for y'all scrubs Land somewhere no one else is going. (If your looking for a bit of fun then I do have to say landing at school is rather fun) Do not try to cross a bridge after 5 minitues of the game starting as the COD player base settle reffuge on the bridge making it impossible to cross just like a immigrant trying to cross the mexcain border apart from guns will be used on sight. When a supply drop is landing use your car and drive underneath and take that drop for a ride far away before the salty 12 year olds gun you down for not letting them get the AWM inside the supply drop you just stole of them only to find out you escaped to get a 8x scope and a level 3 backpack. Always make your squad members enter buildings first so they can die instead of you. The frying pan is the most underatred weapon. The pan can block bullets by the way. I never leave home without me pan. If you are outnumbered and will lose the fight offer your teamates lives and try to barter your way into thier squad and ditch them near the end and then make them regret the decsion of sparing you.Overall I have seen the developers keep working on this game so much and this may be one of the first games in this genre to not remain in early access for 7 years not firing any shots to Day Z or anything if anyone remembers that mess of a game.I have played a lot of this game and I just keep coming back to play with my friends as it is a really fun game wether that's annoying my friends or try harding for the odd time because being the last few sqauds alive is so intense and once you win it's so satisfying It's like when your friend that has been stuck in bronze in league of legends or overwatch etc. and they have finally escaped elo hell and you all cheer with excietment for your scrub of a friend. The shock of winning among your friends is a beautiful moment you then all debate your feelings towards each other as the bond between you all went from 0 100 and now when your friend asks you next time to jump in the back they aren't on about the buggy this time.Just get a group of friends and buy this game you will not regret it and If any of your friends are russian then always queue with them cause they are the real mvp's of this game. Hope to sell you my squad members and shoot you on the island soon.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: TLDR at the bottom Gameplay The game play is fun frustrating and tense only down side may be that if you're playing in a group and you're one of the last one standing in just the group or in the match the tense and frustration meters will sky rocket. every match will be different you might win with only a frying pan and your underpants while the next round you're fighting for your life with damaged armor and only a pistol with a few bullets remaining it kinda makes every round feel ''fresh''Graphics Just put it on (Very) Low everyone does it and its because on higher settings you'll see more bushes and foillage people on lower settings don't so while you might be near invisble on your screen you won't be on somebody elses you'll just be lying in the middle of a hill top for them but non the less the visuals look incredible even on lowSound i would honestly put down a negatieve review if the sound wasn't good sound is one of the most important things in PUBG. its of the essence that the sounds work and that they sound good and thats exactly what it does tracing fired shots just from the direction where they coming from doors below you creaking open alarming you of a possible threat avoiding threats by hearing gunshots and explosions across a silent hill or field. the only annoying sound is when you ahve voice chat on all and you join a lobby because you'll need to buy tampons for your earsEarly Acces State With the full release stated to be somewhere at the end of the year i and many other players hope many of the game breaking bugs and gltiches will fixed. Currently some of the most game breaking bugs are houses not loading properly or loading at all for a player or Mouse stuttering (not sure what causes this but some players incl. myself have had experience with the mouse suddenly stuttering mid firefight this msotly occurs indoors) or just the good 'ol falling through the map and landing in some undergroundwater. there are smaller ones like when you crash into another car you get launched into the air but i'll over see those as they are rather funny and i wouldn't mind if they didn't fix it. Community People went from playing CSGO to this nuff said.TLDR Pros + ''Fresh'' Gameplay each round+ Amazing graphics even on low+ Great SFXParallel Hilarious glitchesCons Gamebraking Bugs and Glitches The communityVerdict This game is like warming up some chicken wings that have been half eaten its broken and its not ready yet but ya still want it. 8/10

review: Don't listen to all the recent negative reviews. This game is awesome fun and extremely playable in its current EA form. It can only get better and the game is being constantly updated. For people moaning about the honkers being banned there is a limit to how annoying people can be before being banned so that they don't ruin it for the entire community. Yes its funny once or twice to honk the horn to the streamers but when you are doing it game after game circling the building and honking without even playing the game at all not looting not even trying to play properly it makes it unplayable not just for the streamers but for everyone. Can't hear anything in the building because some idiot is driving and honking so that they can s to themselves and claim they are on the streamers stream. Not only that but they disconnect and follow them straight into new games when they die making the game they were in less competitive for everyone else.Regardless of that gameplay is amazing and the guns just feel right with loot being evenly spread among the map. Car and bike mechanics deffo need to be worked on but am sure they are working on that. 9/10 game in its current state. Am having lots of fun both playing and watching people play the game.

review: It's a fun game. Can get boring if you play solo as there is a lot of running around and lull points moving from one area to another as you try and find loot or other players to kill.The game can look great but that's asking for trouble even on high end systems as the game is very poorly optimized. Add that in with large amount of server lag you're going to have a tough time hitting other players. It simply doesn't rnu smooth or responsive at all.Not recommended until the game is more optimized and more responsive from player input. If you have friends who want to play with you or if you feel like you're missing out on the current flavor of battle royal that is PUBG then go ahead and waste your money.

review: Honestly I really don't see why there are so many bad reviews for the game.Graphics are pretty average the gunplay is good and the replayability is great at most.People keep complaining about hackers and cheaters without realising that its bound to happen when a competitve game gets released. The dev team IS doing something about the cheaters since most of my deaths have been reasonable. Sure you'll encounter that one match with a hacker but hes bound to get the boot sooner or later. (Also i think region locking china would help too idk thats what the community mostly talks about.)I also like the fact that no matter what gun you're stuck with with the right thinking and plays you can kill other players that have better equipment. This game also punishes you for playing dumb which is a neat factor. In some cases with other battle royal games if you encounter other enemies in a sticky situation you can either build cover or use an ability to get out of said position while in this game if you don't check your surroundings and run in the open you're bound to catch a bullet in the back of your skull.As a new player don't get heated when you die because you will die a LOT. This game doesn't give you any helping hands it simply throws you into a map with 100 players with weapons and wishes you good luck. But don't worry with each game you play you will start to learn from your mistakes and slowly improve and adapt to the game. If you're complaning that this game has microtransactions and thats the only drawback for you that is not a viable excuse. Microtransactions in this game is cosmetic only and you can get cases that are free to open or requires a key to open just by simply getting the game. You can also pick up other dead players clothing / weapon skins too. As for me I like to just play the game get a random crate with the in game credits you get each match sell the key only cases and open those that are free. Every game has microtransactions if the cases had gameplay turning items in there then it would be a problem.While 12.5 hours (at the time this review was written) could possibly not be enough time to write a review about this game I wanted to relate to other people who are new to the game or those who are looking through the homepage and getting nervous by its "Mostly Negative" raiting.TL DR Give this game a chance. Its a fun to play with friends and will always get you on your toes when you hear a close bullet hit the wall (or you). The realistic setting and gameplay is what seperates this with other battle royal games. Hackers are being tackled with more maps are being added and the graphics ain't that bad. (I also heard that the PUBG devs are upgrading the game to a different engine although i may be wrong.). If you don't want this game thats fine but it doesn't deserve the rating it has.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I have just surpassed the 200 hour mark in this game and still feel the same eagerness to play yet another match as I did when I had only 1 hour in this game. Don't get me wrong this game has some flaws and developers who are care more about money than improving the game and fixing some annoying bugs and the ever present hacker problem but overall this is an incredible game. You'll need 50 hours and an iron will to pick up that chicken dinner but there's nothing in all of gaming more satisfying than finally getting to kill that last annoying little player and being shown the infamous phrase " Winner Winner Chicken Dinner " . Would recommend. 8/10
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Too glitchy to enjoy and it doesn't really add anything new to the genre. Slightly better graphics thanks to the Unreal Engine than most competitors but the lag is very real. I have a solid PC and numerous others have said the same thing.I just can't suggest it if it added something new or was a unique addition then maybe I'd suggest it but with how many EA titles never actually get completed and never get fine tuned I just don't have the faith anymore. I'm going to ask for a refund at this point. Some of the fun I've had in the game including not seeing a single person until there was 25 left then hearing a gunshot and getting an error message pop up about server connections I didn't get disconnected I just lost all control of my character while someone shot me down. Another experience was starting off parachuting down watching around me for others dropping and not seeing anything. Still being cautious when I land. I'm inside a house had closed the doors so I'd hear people coming looting and someone kills me from within the same room. Zero noise. Hum... Ok. This latest time I was in the open was very sketched out and had run from one of the red zones which basically drop bombs on a small area I was constantly checking my sides and behind me as I was in a very wide open area then again without making any noise whatsoever a buggy appears next to me made me jump because I had just been looking the direction it apparently came from buddy manages to kill me. This is real easy to chalk up to me not being very good at the game but I'm not buying that explanation. A vehicle should make noise opening doors should make noise there's no way I would have been caught unaware like that especially in the second situation because I was very paranoid with my positioning. I was expecting to get sniped from a distance at any second and instead a vehicle appears from what I can only describe as "no where" and manages to somehow get the drop on me? That sketchy combined with the losing server connection and the general lag of the game I mean again I have a great PC and even with everything on low I was getting bad frame rates and very chunky gameplay and the graphics which like I mentioned at the start are really the only thing this game has on others of the same genre the graphics blow because everythings set to low. Not enjoyable. Maybe if they get the underlying code sorted out so things aren't so laggy but I'm not sticking around to find out.

review: For Max Payne the tragedies that took his loved ones years ago are wounds that refuse to heal. No longer a cop close to washed up and addicted to pain killers Max takes a job in São Paulo Brazil protecting the family of wealthy real estate mogul Rodrigo Branco in an effort to finally escape his troubled past. But as events spiral out of his control Max Payne finds himself alone on the streets of an unfamiliar city desperately searching for the truth and fighting for a way out. Combining cutting edge shooting mechanics with a dark and twisted story Max Payne 3 is a seamless highly detailed cinematic experience from Rockstar Games.

review: I've been enjoying this game quite a bit so far so I thought I might as well leave a review even if it's utterly pointless because I was the last person on Earth who didn't have this game so it's not like my opinion can influence anyone anyway.PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is the incredibly popular battle royale game that has dominated the Steam storefront since it emerged back in 2017 and for good reason it's quite a fun competitive game whether you're avoiding your enemies and using your skills to survive in solo or putting up a more coordinated effort as a duo or group. Everyone knows what it's about but basically you parachute onto a map from a plane with a large number of other people (maybe around 80 90) and have to survive and kill your enemies while making your way to the increasingly shrinking circle within a set amount of time before you start taking damage. You can also choose whether to play the game in fixed first person or toggleable third person an interesting use of the game camera that actually changes the game quite significantly as it alters the field of vision considerably and may give some other advantages like being able to peek around corners.There are three large maps available one of which was introduced recently the classic Erangel a Russian island populated with various towns and military installations Miramar a desert scattered with ghettos and ruins and the new Sanhok a jungle with a lot of natural structures like caves. It's a decent selection and it'll be a long time before I see everything these maps have to offer and there's lots of locations where a range of loot can spawn. Honestly I don't really like Sanhok that much I don't think it's a BAD map I just don't really like the playstyle or aesthetic there personally but the other two are definitely quite appealing to me.In terms of the gunplay and combat I have to admit that it's a bit of a struggle for me aiming isn't easy by any means (I was going to say that it's 'realistic' but honestly I don't know whether that's true) and there's lots of different attachments to get for your weapons from scopes to extended magazines to compensators to suppressors that spice up the shooting considerably. There's a good selection of weapons with a range of different advantages and disadvantages to each one and it seems fairly balanced there's also some nice extra detail like the frying pan melee weapon being able to deflect bullets. Vehicles can also be utilised in combat and I've been run over a couple of times! Though really I think they're more practical for escaping the oncoming blue wall of death than trying to ram into other people.The community of this game seems decent for the most part. They're very vocal in their (perhaps rightful) criticism of aspects of the game such as the event pass and lootboxes and I do think it's shameful that paid cosmetic items were added to the game at a very early stage when other issues like optimisation don't seem to have been handled very well. The game actually runs fine for me on a 4 year old AMD setup so I don't have any issues personally but some people claim to be on similar or even better specs and run into difficulty so maybe the developers need to work on making their game more compatible with the drivers out there. The only thing I'm noticing are some fairly glaring latency issues at the start of the match that a lot of people seem to get and I keep spamming the button to pick up items soon after I parachute down and it won't work for a good five seconds it's only a minor issue but in a game that's sold this well I don't think it's unreasonable to expect such things to be fixed.What would I like to see from this game in future? Really I think it's got a lot going for it already and I don't find anything in the game to be particularly lacking the only notable thing I can mention is text chat which is somehow not a feature in this game. Not everyone uses a mic (personally I'm a notorious shyboy) and whilst I can use steam chat when playing with friends it's difficult to do this when I'm playing group games with complete strangers I've randomly been matched with. And of course as previously stated I think there are a few technical issues that could use some work.I think it's good though. Not the most amazing experience I've ever had in an online game like some people would claim but definitely a solid 8/10.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: The gameplay itself is amazing and if you enjoy FPS games coop strategy or just battle royale games then yeah I would recommend this to you. A lot of the game feels polished in comparison for some other games that have been in "Early Access" for years now.HOWEVER Blueholes PR department needs a run through because it's pretty much non existant. They introduced crate and key microtransactions into the game through the last patch and unfortunately for me that pulls it down enough to leave a negative review. They said at launch all free ways to get cosmetics would be gone and we would basically have to do the CSGO "gambling" method to obtain anything or buy off the steam market place again forcing us to spend real world money on the cosmetics. There is no leveling system in the game no sense of progression or reward. If we can't get cosmetics for free then I have to ask what's the point of playing? We play games to get a sense of an achievement a reward sprinkled along the way to whatever goal we have is necessary to keep our attention. If they added a sort of Overwatch system where you can level up and gain free crates with that then sure that would be amazing. As it stands though I am comlpetely against their crate and key system and not having anyway to get items for free after launch scares me.

review: 200 MBPS Connection and wired in... all day today I caught nothing but network lag and screen lock up. I understand this is early release but I just want to point flaws like this because it is extremely frustrating.I would catch the network lag connection screen and I'd close out the game and reconnect and it would work fine. Then 3 minutes later the same thing would happen.I don't want to recommend this game currently for purchase because the game is still experiencing problems like this that prevent you from being able to actually play the game.As far as game play when it works it is amazing. I love the concept but game inhibiting problems like this are kind of a deal breaker for game purchase.UPDATE This network lag detection seems to be router specific. After locating a reddit post about it I was able to fix the problem using QoS settings. It was strange thought this only recently started happening. I will change recommendation to yes.

review: I reviewed this before calling it buggy and unoptimized. Now they have put out the 1 month patch and i must say it is STILL buggy and unoptimized. It might even be worse. EDIT i wrote this review quite sometime ago when the 1 month patch came out. I have to say this game is still poorly optimized buggy filled with hackers devs that ban you for honking and "stream sniping" when you didn't stream snipe ads for VPNs for china and so much more is wrong with the game. I believe it is only a matter of time before this game is completely dethroned and no one even thinks about it anymore. This is a cash grab that is it hence the MOVIE theyre now making out of a game with literally no story. It is just a way to get even more money and to never complete their game. After almost 500 hrs played I have finally given up on bluehole and uninstalled their game. We all hoped that this dev wouldn't be as bad as h1z1 but sadly they have proven to be even worse. Looking forward to the first AAA battle royale game that comes out and makes everyone forget pubg even exist.

review: So 1.0 Release... Optimization fixes? Sweet New content e.g guns and maps? NiceEven small attention to detail such as using medical supplies in cars so you're thinking why I wouldn't recommend this game well quite simple it's the servers.As a person that's played many FPS's for me the most important thing in any FPS would be my Frames and my Ping but none of that matters if I'm getting shot around corners on spawn just because I'm in an area where other players landed this was noted as a bug and said to be "fixed" but yet have I seen any consistency with it in fact the shotguns are probably more consistent(which by the way are a complete joke) The most important part of the game is landing looting and then toward the end circles however what's the point if you can't even defend yourself correctly from the beginning I will say this game is amazing but however this "Full released" version of it is just a joke.I could write about the crashing the guns the veichles since the majority have flaws or seem even useless however i'm sure other people have already talked about that. My only issue is the servers. I will change my review if they truly fix these issues since it has and still can be enjoyable but until they're fixed save your money.P.SThis a review for what I'VE experienced in this game of course this may differ from user to user I'm just trying to give a little input of how the game is in it's current state and the issues I've encountered.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Hello! So a few weeks ago I purchased this game because of all the talk about it. I was very excited to open and play a new game until I got into it.. So this game is honestly just a complete rip off of H1Z1 King of The Kill which is a game i love! This game has fancy graphics and fancy guns which is a factor that H1Z1 needs. First of all this game is CPU dependant which is not a good thing for me. My cpu is really crappy and this game runs like I have a 200$ CPU and this game cant freaking run. My cpu is kinda old but its expensive ( I could run this game on ultra with 40FPS (also i have a GTX 1080) Im used to playing games smoothly with a solid 100 or so FPS so when a game plays at 40 FPS it looks like trash. GAMEPLAY This game is really pretty and consists of you falling out of a airplane onto a large map filled with 100 other players. You battle to the death with guns and weapons you find around the map. What I hate is that this LITERALLY IS A COMPLETE RIPOFF Of H1Z1 KING OF THE KILL. This game does get a bit boring after like 2 hours of playing it. Idk why this got so boring when ive played h1z1 literally all night. CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION Ah yes my favorite part of any game (not really) The character customization is simple and crappy. You can choose a hairstyle gender and color of skin. Its really frekin' bad. For example In fallout 4 (one of my favorite games) the character customization is really good because you can COMPLETELY alter the face of your character into whatever you want. This is my longest review lol Weapons Weapons are a big factor in these kind of games. The weapons are very nice in this game with good sound effects and good textures. In H1Z1 there are only like 6 or 7 guns compared to like 30 in this game. Idk if there is any melee weapons in this game or not so im not going to touch this subject. Conclusion My final rating is 4/10 a decent game for newer gamers but crap for expierenced gamers..ALSO THIS IS MY OPINION DO NOT GET MADDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game proves that any battle royal game will make money no matter how horrible the mechanics bugs or gameplay is. Must be nice to exploit the battle royal genre in order to profit big time $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ (11million in the first day of steam sales...) 7/19/17 The lead developer would rather spend his time moderating popular twitch streamers and banning them at the drop of a ball for one team kill as opposed to sending a warning out saying Hey we have a no tolerance rule for team killing. Don t do it again . If team killing was a no tolerance offence why wasn t the game released with a system to report team killers? I know that I am not going to take the time to record and then formally submit a complaint to the website in order to get a mere team killer banned Then the dev went as far as to claim victim over a joke on twitter because they got beat up in college or something stupid like that Dev logic Create a game based on violence then get triggered over someone who s character is based off of violence speed momentum... Are you serious? Are we 10 years old? Can we not take an obvious joke? These are actions from developers I do not support. The game is not that great to overlook these actions taken by THE LEAD DEVELOPER HIMSELF If the lead dev is getting mad over violence imagine what this guy is going to turn this game into . The overdramatic money hungry devs will guaranteed turn this game into the s h i t show that H1Z1 became.1.0 Update 12/21/17Dev logic work on new sh*tty map cars skins loot boxes and vaulting instead of fixing the major lag issues or all the other game ruining problems . 1.0 is an unfinished pile of garbage for a game. I still do not recommend.

review: Do not buy into the hype just yet huge warning as the game is still in alpha stage it is not optomized at all. Ignore the minimum specs even the recommended specs will run the game sluggish. When the game did run on max settings on a gti 1060 it still didn't look great (the game isn't about graphics anyways) it is the performence of the game that killed it for me and had me go get a refund. For how the game looks and feels I don't see any reason what so ever for an excuse as to how it actually runs. buildings will warp when you try to go through doors sometimes you just completely freeze for no reason even when running good fps it would just completely drop to zero. from what I read i7's and i5's are having the biggest problems I ran a gti 1060 with 16gb ddr4 2133 and a h270 pro motherboard with an i5 4460. This rig and setup runs everything you can throw at it on ultra but because this game is not optomized it runs poorly at times and can cause fps drops and warping near buildings.

review: I liked the game fantasy. I liked exploring the map and preparing the battle. The game can make you feel tense as gunfire rattles in the background. Or that could just be me. This game is what you make of it. I generally don't like online FPS but the game premise intrigued me. It's basically like the movie "Hunger Games" In the sense that you survive by scavenging for supplies and fighting others players. I hoped to see a sense of tooth and nail stratergy in battle. Unfortunatly the gameplay 95% of the time consists of you getting shot and dying all within the span of about two seconds. There's no way to counteract this. Other FPS titles such as "Battlefield" or "Call of Duty" get around this dilemma by offering instant respawn. Loading between each match (especially since a game could last potentially no more than a minute) takes about five minutes (which is abysmal). It's almost like the game encourages camping.

review: Sooo... what do we have in Playerunknown's Battlegrounds? you have your customizable chracter you may play alone or in a group up to 4 people in it you deciede where and when you want to jump out of plane safezone appears after everyone lands on the ground weapons are highlighted so you can't miss them on the ground you will find cars and motorcycles you earn ingame money to buy crates with clothes for your character you may customize your weapons with optics muzzles etc.UI and inventory is clunky but I guess it's a common thing to all games inspired by Arma.Moving your character feels like you were tryng to take a selfie with a brick mounted to your selfiestick.Also every freaking vehicle in this game is a hovercraft in disguise. Seriously I'm worried that if I drive faster I might actually take off with no way returning to the ground. Vehicles are weightless and terrain doesn't affect them as much as it should. Sound variates from good to terrible. Single shots are good but explosions and many simultaneous shots will make your ears bleeding. It's like sound is looping.Despite all similarities to ArmA3 PUBG is an Arcade Shooter and feels like it. While wearing helmet you can eat main dish made of lead twice before it force you to horizontal stance.There is effect of engagement and accomplishment which is good. Participation in game makes you a better fighter and earns you little cash that you can spend on your character.Although I can't recomend it right now especially when you are fellow gamer who earns his money in currency other than $ or . Price 30 is too hight for such a small arcade game even with nice character customization options. It's bet to wait for a discount 20 would be a good deal and everything below 18 sounds like a great deal. The game concept is good but needs some serious polishing. You will encounter lags frame drops bugs that gives advantage to you or your oponent texture glitches drop spawn delays and glitches sound glitches etc. etc.If you believe in optimisation in this game you may as well believe in Satnta. But there is actually a miracle here coz game runs the same on all visual settings. Well different story is that it runs like horse crap.Since my first visit not much has changed I hope developers will keep to their promise and they will fnish the game in a half year period.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I first heard about this game about a week before the early access release back in december 2017. I immidiatly falled in love with the Battle Royal concept being on a plane with 99 other guys and know that only one of us would still be standing up at the end of the game. The first time I played the game (the day of the release) I remember that I had that feeling telling myself "this is huge" .... The last time in my life I had a such great feeling was the first time I played Counter Strike (Alpha version) back in 1999 I told myself this game is special. Ok to be honest I may have told myself the same thing the first time I played GTA... But honnestly I haven't played any game in my life that much I played Counter Strike and I am quite sure that PUBG is here for a long time. What I love with PUBG is that I can run a game in solo whenever I want to play and I don't need to rely on any third people... Random teamates use to be a mess... I love even more when I play the game in squad with some friends and that's what initially loved in Counter Strike the team play.Now many people complain about this game at the eSport level being too random... I agree that that part is still a problem at a high competition level but when it come to have fun you will for sure enjoy this game for a long time.

Its just mindblowing! Its alot better than H1Z1 or Arma 3 and it has much more to offer. 10/10 would definitely buy again!!!EDIT A lot happened in the past months and I gotta say Pubg went through some serious Problems but its still awesome and now with the vaulting it got even more awesome! They did a good job but still got a problem here and there but I really recommend this game cause its just mind blowing!

review: Too many salty idiots in these Reviews that dont know how a game is made/ran.Pubg Corp. is trying their darndness to fix the spaghetti code that was used to creat the game. unfortunately Epic Games owns the Engine the game was built upon and is withholding the most recent version (That best supports large maps) so that they can strangle them.There are people in these Reviews that cite the games collision physics still being Wonky. A) Unreal EngineB) Old Version of Unreal EngineAnother group of people have cited that Pubg Corp. Only care about skins and making Pubg Mobile.these people are the worst offenders of bad misinformation. The skins are made by an art department and trust me its much easier to crank those out than to fix the base code of the game. You cant complain about skins because its different people.Secondly Pubg Corp. Doesnt even make Pubg Mobile. Tencent Studios in China Licensed and made it. Others say that Pubg is slowing development. And to that I call those people idiots too. They have steadily released real new content to the people every month. I say that is plenty for me especially when the content is so good.I love this game and I want to see success from it. It has real problems and those need to be addressed but so does every game including the scurge of fortnite. I think this game has some serious potential and if the hate campaigns stopped I think we would all be able to see that.

If you still believe in camping and absolutely hate them campers.... well sorry to say you just wasted your money. 6. review: The year is 2019. You are still playing PUBG instead of Apex Legends for some unfathomable reason. You don't understand why your internet friends no longer speak to you and constantly appear offline on all game platforms. You quietly watch PUBG load up again after crashing for the fifth time in an hour. You load up Twitch while you wait for a game to see if your favorite streamer has finally gone back to playing PUBG after marathon streaming Apex Legends every day for 18 hours a day all week they haven't. You stare at yourself in the mirror. All your clothes are ridiculous looking and your haircut is horrifying. You have terrible taste and it doesn't just show in the games you play. You get out of your chair and hop on your Segway to go down to the store but the Segway ends up taking control of itself and driving you out your window crashing to your death. As it turns out much like PUBG the Segway had been totally compromised by Chinese hackers. Nobody attends your funeral.This game is trash.

review: Product received for free. Making room for release review.Release Review 4/29/18 The game is still unoptimized but it's a lot better than it used to be. Hackers are now gone but from my experience I have only encountered 2 hackers (potentially 3) hackers. There's more content in the game now with a new map on the way. (Which is decent have played it.) Mechanics are a lot better compared to EA. Driving is better(ish) Terrain is getting reworked soon Custom Games are really good. New Events Every 2 weeks(?) more or less.I'd bump it up to a 9/10 (From the EA version)10 if they would optimize it more and add more weapons.EARLY ACCESS REVIEW IGNORE ALL THE PLAYERS THAT COMPLAIN ABOUT MICROTRANSACTIONS AND THE BUGS This game is a WIP (Work In Progress). It is in EARLY ACCESS so there are going to be problems with it.All the microtransactions do in this game is give you cosmetic items clothes masks gloves hats etc etc.The game overall is Good .Sure there are bugs hilarious ones at that but who cares? It's not like your life is literally on the line.They're going to fix things like the server issues right now. (Being fixed by tomorrow at the latest)They've already pushed a patch a few hours ago optimizing FPS/Stuttering/etc.I'd give the game right now a 7/10.Needs more content like maps weapons cosmetics.(Cosmetics for the people who do not wish to dish out a few extra dollars)Needs more weather etc. By the way this is all already planned. 7/10. With this new Vaulting System coming out + plus the new map and HOPEFULLY optimizations...Easily could bump this to 9/10.

review: While this game is great and I enjoy it I am giving it a bad review simple because of its players the way people play is disgusting the way they camp I was fully equipped and ready when I heard a guy outside I was on the roof I looked around couldn't find him I finally see him he is at the bottom of my building he has no helmet still has a shotgun and no loot this was at 28 remaining and the safezone was pretty far and quite dangerous if you stayed in it so I try to jump on the ledge on the roof but thanks to this games 100% working mechanics my guy just jumps and gets blocked by ledge meanwhile the other guy went into the house so I decide to be the brave one and make a move I jump down to make a run for my car to at least move away so I am safe from the "gas" to my "surprise" as soon as I land he kills me with the shotgun now I died I get it you can't win everygame but the fact I died to a guy camping me downstairs with a shotgun no helmet 0 loot at 28 remaining is just like how do you do it?!??!? Like how does this happen how do you not have loot??? was he camping these very houses the whole game? Because they weren't looted like what if I never jumped down? He never knew I had a car I parked it behind another house like if I stayed up there what would he have done? Like it baffles me how he didn't rush me so he can get the **** out of the gas considering he had no helmet and no weapon except a shotgun I highly doubt he had any medical supplies to heal up against the level 3 gas phase and it's like why do I waste my time looting &amp killing to die to this? It isn't worth $30 not in its current state (Referring to all the bugs still in the game and to a lot of stuff that needs work like I landed one time directly next to a guy but my parachute got stuck and it takes like 10 seconds to cut off parachute so I wait and this guy is just staring at me confused when I finally cut it we run for the same house he goes in like 2 seconds earlier from the back and I come in through the front the extra time he had was useless! He had 2 seconds ahead of me and I still managed to loot the m16 and ammo while he looted a shotgun like if I had never got stuck because of that glitch he would've been an easy first kill by far the slowest looter I have met). While what the guy (camping me) did is not wrong its just a waste for my time to be honest and that is why I say the way people play like why not rush me and fight me bro you have a shotgun man the up game is full of cowards don't get me started on the people who loot an x8 scope and an SKS and run for the center of the safezone and camp there. (I got up on the roof to scout the area shot a guy twice couldn't kill him spotted another but too far and spotted a car that was also far I wasn't camping and I was looting the building so I went to the roof to scout either way)

review: After about 260 hours of playing this game. There are flaws but there are good things well. A lot of angry entitled kids are gonna whine about a game that's in early access. To those people YOU BOUGHT EARLY ACCESS DID YOU THINK IT WAS GONNA BE DONE OVERNIGHT? IT'S NOT A AAA TITLE RELEASE. That being said here are my pro's and con's.Cons The servers do lag hopefully to be fixed at 1.0 release. The hackers but it comes with the territory. Look at CS GO. At lease the ban waves do come out. That being said I only see real hackers once every 20 games or so. The bugginess. I know most people don't like bugs but I ing love them. But that's only like the car bugs and the ones where you fall through the ground. It gives the game character lol. That being said picking up the same weapon 4 times until it registers is annoying. Single player is kind of dull if you aren't good at the game. I finally have gotten somewhat decent and can hold my own but when I first started it was miserable dying to people that were super good in less than a week of the game being available. Close combat sucks. Shotguns are unpredictable. SMG's are less so but still. They need to fix how much skill you need for close combat. Need more clothes please. I know we just got abunch for gamescom but still not varied enough.Pros The game is a total blast with friends. The thrill of never knowing what might happen gives every match anticipation. My hands shake sometimes when I am on the verge of winning a tough match. Few games make my heart race like this. Strong map. I love how varied and big the map is. It's really fun to drive through the countryside pull over to check buildings to find another team and blast your way through them. The equipment. I like how the guns are varied enough that it just is exciting to find your gun. Every time I find a SCAR L SKS or Mini 14 I get real excited. I am obsessed with getting the attachments I need for them. I once got a fully fleshed out M4 and made my friend spew his drink when I said "You may be an M4 but you've got a sweet little " The visuals are pretty good when maxed out. Graphics aren't so high end that I lag or lose frame rate but they are high enough that I enjoy what I see. Good balance of function and form. THE LONG RANGE GUNPLAY IS ING ROCK SOLID. I love taking a shot with a Kar 98k and seeing the bullet zip through the sky and diving straight into someone's skull. It's truly a satisfying feeling. Vehicles Not entirely bad not entirely great. But it's pretty fun ramping off hills in motorcycles and doing flips or crashing through people in the UAZ. Buggies are good. I think Dacia's need some work though.Overall the game has flaws but its strengths stand out. I suggest playing this game with friends but play alone to learn and hone your skills. This game has tons of replay value and is overall good if you realize it is early access. Anyone who complains about the servers lag or other similar flaws before release doesn't really have a right to until 1.0 release. They are just being entitled.SCORE 9/10
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Why is the movement so clunky and awkward?Why is the spectator mode so desynced in a game where death is permanent and you have nothing to do but watch your friends after you die?Why do the menus not work half the time needing to be refreshed before a simple button works?Why does the game default to solo on the Asian server after every single game even though I always select solo FPP on the North American server?Why is the scoring system so inconsistent?Why can't I as the passenger in a car drink an energy drink while the car is moving?Why do my ankles snap when getting out of a vehicle moving at about five miles per hour when I'm able to jump off the roof of a school and carry on like nothing happened?Why are loot and vehicles so poorly distributed across the map?Why does nearly every two story house have only one way to get upstairs?Why are the graphics so bad?Why is turning down certain graphics settings advantageous in a game like this?I have a lot more questions too.I know someone's going to tell me that it's because it's early access but that's no excuse for the play button not working. Even the cheapest shovelware copy and paste games managed to get that right.( Fortnite is much more fun )

review: Product received for free. PlayerUnknown's BattleGrounds is truly a magnificent game. It s honestly one of my favorites. The developers who dedicated all of their time just for this game are all wonderful they all support their community as well as listen to the community. I feel that they honestly want to create the perfect game for all of us who has supported them since the beginning to those who support them now and no doubt for those who will support them in the future. This development team and the PUBG is definitely worthy of all of my support as well as all the support the community has given them. I m honestly glad that I was able to witness PUGB from Pre Alpha to Beta. They ve come a long way in such a short period of time it s pretty amazing. I want to say congratulations to Bluehole Inc. on making it this far and for all the entertainment PUGB and the community has given me. Everyone I ve met talked to and played with have been great. PUGB will most certainly give me the rush everytime I play it. Thanks for creating a game that I ve fell in love with.

The materials are * ed* the sounds are terrible the lag is beyond terrible (hint you can't use Unreal in the way you're using it without re writing the network stack and there's no way in hell you're going to make 100 player multiplayer work in any acceptable fashion unless you're a networking code guru which clearly no one involved in this game is.Rubber banding everywhere for everyone in the few bits of time that you aren't completely halted by a scrimmed out "NETWORK LAG" notification. review: 이 게임은 구조 자체가 쓰레기인 게임입니다.게임을 로비로 나가겠다고 하면 무조건 처음 시작하는 로딩 화면을 봐야해요.패치를 하면 할 수록 또 다른 버그를 만들어내는 대단 업데이트 실력을 보여주며 핵은 전혀 잡지 않고 방관하는 모습의 답답한 운영도 덤으로 볼 수 있는 게임입니다.게다가 중국 지역락을 걸어달라고 전세계적으로 요청해도 들어처먹지 않는 소통능력과 솔로로 스쿼드를 뛰고 난 다음 다음게임을 할때는 자동으로 솔로로 바뀌어 있어서 또 또 또 솔쿼드로 바꿔줘야하는 매우 답답한 UI까지 갖고있는게임입니다.제 평생 이런 갓겜은 본 적이 없는 것 같아요 ㅎㅎㅎ패치 좀 잘 해보세요 제발 부탁드립니다.

review: A great game but too "early access". I can barely play this game with every setting on "very low" and it still lags as hell.Also the sounds crack every time when there is lots of gunfire or bombing going on. I can play RUST with every settings on max and it lags less even tho RUST has more beautiful graphics (I have updated all my devices and have Razer headphones).Besides the cracking sounds the game makes it is really difficult to hear which direction enemy is firing and the whole surround sounds feels lame/unaccurate. There is also huge number of cheaters in this game plus other minor bugs/problems that comes secondary in my review because it is just an early access game.I hope the devs makes adjustments for performance issues in this game because i wanna get the full experience of it.ATMO Score PUBG 6/10RUST 10/10

review: Buy this game if you want an extremely unoptimized twitch contract streamer advantageous hacker filled game. Literally just another garbage FPS cash grabber. Oh and within months of Alpha release they before updating optimization found time to add in paid content (which they said they would not do until they released Beta). They allow world wide server switching allowing players to have extreme desync advantage. The loot spawns primarily for only those players who have 150+ constant twitch viewers to make the game seem better than it is. Aimbotting hackers in every game. Buildings never render and get you killed instantly when finally starting a match. Generally a game goes as such Sit in a lobby for 2 minutes take 3 minutes to land with a parachute die within 15 seconds and repeat. Loading screens account for over 90% of your playtime.

Things are looking good. Loot the town dry full inventory and level 3 everything... things are looking great.Go to the next town kill 4 solo teams...Looking fantastic. Drive to the next zone hide in a bush no one knows im here. See a guy shooting at another guy wait for him to kill the aggressor then snipe the victor of that small battle... at 5 kills now...things are looking perfect. Zone starts to get smaller so I jump from my balcony and suspect no one continues to know my position... Start taking damage panic ensues "where am I getting hit from" "i dont see anything " 2 players left. 1 dies outside the playzone...1v1...start getting excited "I got this just one left".... BANG BANG BANG. dead. laying down looking up at the flying camera angle showing my bleeding corpse and out from a bush emerges a naked man only holding a pistol with 20 bullets. TRIGGERED. 10/10 would play again.

review: Let me help you decide if the game is worth your time.PUBG is the game that made the BR genre so popular and is by far the most played game on Steam. It has realistic gunplay mechanics and I haven't yet played a multiplayer game were gunplay is better. The weapons are very good for the most part and a recent balance patched made many of them viable and usable. There are 2 big maps Erangel (green frields and mountains) and Miramar (rocky desert). With the addition of Sanhok the third map this game got a new fresh feeling for me personally. It's very fun and rewarding if you master it and has a really high skill cap.Now a bit about the bad sides of the game. Optimization is poor but getting better. If you have a medium range PC you should be able to play this game easily (my friend is running it with an Athlon X4 AMD Radeon 550 and 8gb of DDR3 ram without problems). The server tickrate has been increased which improved gameplay a lot. The servers are unstable from time to time and that can sometimes be annoying but the devs are very communicative on Discord and quickly resolve these issues.What people have been crying about but is honestly a stupid reason to complain about are cosmetics clothes and weapon skins. They are completely irrelevant to the gameplay and expecting to get them for free is unfair. Nobody is forcing you to buy it if somebody really wants them he will spend 10 for a weapon skin. Focus on playing the game properly instead of playing it with fancy skins.Conclusion The 20 price tag is really good for somebody who wants to get into this game if that somebody likes realistic shooting mechanics a big map and hardcore gameplay.

review: TLDR Arma and Rust had a baby during the hunger games super fun.I hated on this game so hard it looked like h1z1 and Rust and I figured it was just another knock off of those games. After having a balance in my steam wallet burning a hole through my computer I finally decided to look up some gameplay videos about it and give it a chance. Graphics aren't bad at all the game runs just about flawlessly aside from a few early access bugs which are to be expected not game breaking ones either. I quickly fell in love with this game not only is it extremely enjoyable playing with a squad of friends but solo is almost just as fun and makes up for it with extra points earned.5 stars easily for this game especially since its early access with so little bugs. Get it!

review: the year is 2017. i dont know how i know but i do!i woke up on an island along with about 100 other people. they started yelling weird s*** in different languages at each other. some of them found weapons they started firing into the crowd of the rest of us. blood fire and smoke was everywhere but it didnt seem to hurt anyone.suddenly out of nowhere everything turns black and i wake up in an airplane with the same people as before. im not sure if they all know whats going on or they have all lost their mind as im starting to since they are all still screaming like crazy.the hatch on the plane opens and people start jumping out still yelling what i assume is battlecries.the plane is about half empty when i decide to take the chance and jump out looking for cover in any building i can and hoping for some supplies and possibly some weapons to defend myself should the need arise.after a couple of minutes i see a blue wall kinda thing come rushing towards me. it scares the out of me and i run as fast as i can away from it looking for some kind of vehicle. adrenaline is pumping as i spot a jeep in the distance. i get into it and start driving at full speed over hills and fiels to get away from what i have come to call "the blue death".as i drive shots are being fired in the distance and hitting the jeep. i start evasive maneuvers and avoid being shot to death from whoever and whereever it was.i noticed the blue death stopping behind me and i start looking for new cover.a nice 2 story house with ammunition inside. should do just fine. when i get to the 2nd floor i see a medkit on the floor which should come in handy later. just as im about to pick it up i hear a sound behind me...F***!!.... some was hiding behind the door having put the medkit there as bait. before i get to draw my weapon he shot my head off...everything got black and i wake up...back on the island... with 100 other people...wondering when this hell will stop.CTTO

Top overall player charts or not there is Hardly any Content MANY MANY gunplay glitches Collision is Horrifying trying to jump over broken walls and barbed wire is Sickening The Anti Cheat "Battleye" has been compromised many months ago There is only one positive Bullet Physics are Outstanding. Drag and Drift are very Realistic. Hopefully since this is "Beta" they fix these issues but honestly this is Unreal Engine?!?! How is there this many issues??? I cannot recommend simply because of the Physics alone. Needs a LOT of work. Think before dropping a whopping 29 bucks on this Hastily built quickly boring "Beta".

review: So far this is the best game on the market for battleroyal type gamemodes it is completly unmatched. Despite this there are downsides as all modern day games have. Lets start with the pros It is fun very fun. The safezone system works very well and is acurate/fair on its damage The feeling of winning is great each and everytime The current map Erangel Is great it has such a variety of areas to go to which can never get boring the new Desert map sounds great as well and will only boost this games immense popularity I personally like the crates and cosmetics for this game its a nice feature. I know it went agaist what the developers said to be in the early access version but it is a much better experience with it than without it. I still don't get why micro transations are so hated its your own choice to buy them and people like me can make money off it and it helps out the dev's. And many more that I will have forgot to mention Moving on to the cons of this game You will need a fair PC to run this game Currnetly the movment while jumping things like the walls is clunky but that should be fixed in the next vaulting/leaping update There is lag at the start of each game making picking up items a little messed up and glichly which can really screw you over at certain parts of the map e.g. School. Servers are not the greatest to say the least Overall its a great game 10/10 from me which it will only get better.

review: At the moment 5/10... It have got some fixes and new maps but i can feel some old problems in the game Some random crashs Strange framedrops Really bad optimization Some hackers and some teams with 8 ppl (grouping) The graphic is a lot better than the beta but i still fell that it is heavier than beautiful When you reach the floor with the parachute you have a chance of get floating in the air take some damage or get bugged into walls/constructions. A real shame...I only recommend this game if you have a group of friends that already have this game who you can play with. This game get REALLY sickening if you play for much hours. If you're going play a lot and maybe sell the crates you can have some return of the money invested to buy the game.

review: I enjoyed the first few matches of this game but quickly started to notice the same issues.Netcode. The connection frequently stutters. Sometimes I get the classic BF lag where I load shots into an unsuspecting enemy and they turn on me.Clunky. I have yet to play other battle royale style games but the game has a great deal of clunkyness to the movement. I often clip doors and rails trying to move around in CQC.Thumbs down for now...

review: First off let me say I put in ALOT of hours in the open beta and couldn't not wait for this to hit EA.What I like The gun selection is awesome and it looks like more to come even one came out with EA's release You don't just find weapons lying around in this Battle Royale you can fit your weapon with various scopes grips and other mods The realism (compared to the other popular Battle Royale game H1Z1) You can't premed before a fight in order to have an upper hand on your opponent Jumping exists in this game but none of this unrealistic rage inducing bhopping that can prevent others from getting a hit on you (might I also bring up the prone and crouch spammers of H1 here As well) Vehicles are balanced and it isn't practical to play hide and seek all game in one like in H1Z1 (plus you can't jump out at high speed to get the drop in an enemy like in H1. Gameplay is smooth although you can get stuck on certain things fairly easy so new players beware jumping on everythingWhat I think should be improved and my only issue is optimization. However it's at the top of the devs priority. Also most negative reviews you will see her give it a thumbs down for this reaon.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Wish I didn't buy this game it's fun at first then gets boring very fast if you sit in a building and play safe the entire time it's an easy win Most servers have insane Lag gotta pick up ammo 4 times and then load your gun 3 times overall it's not worth buying because you will quickly get bored of Tyler Perry's battlegrounds aka a ing joke of a game
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds is currently the largest battle royale on Steam. I first played this game when it just came out and was still in beta. Back then it was a buggy mess and it still is but I have seen lots of improvement for peformance. This game is not easy to run and I do not recommend playing this on a low end computer. The weather is pretty loud honestly but it doesn't bother me that much. PUBG is also very slow paced and not everyone is a fan of that. Controls feel fine in my opinion and the shooting is also great. I hope to see improvements to the game in the future. I rate PUBG a 6/10.

review: I bought the game with the intention to give it back before hitting 2 hours. I've been playing with some friends that day and as you can see I still do. I highly recommend this game for the price of 30 /$. Since it hasn't reached the release yet I wasn't mad that first person servers weren't implemented until a few days ago. Just look at BF1 that game was released at full price without optional hardcore settings (How could they ever do that?) while this game already has everything it needs! The whole drama around microtransactions was rightful and as you can see the devs listened to the players We now have free cosmetics and optional ones! Great!Only negative aspect atm I wished that "stream sniping" wasn't against the rules. Other devs handled this issue better. IMHO I think that streamers should worry about that issue not devs. Banning people for stream sniping who claim to be innocent left a bitter taste in my mouth.

review: I hate this game. I was contemplating between this or H1Z1 and I decided to buy this which was a bad idea. this game is VERY slow. I don't know if it's just me but I never see ANYONE. People camp EVERYWHERE. I mean EVERYWHERE! Don't expect to do or go anywhere in this game. "Battlegrounds" more like "let me camp in this house until everyone dies so I can survive." I'd say per 5 matches I play I only see 2 3 people. I don't know why I literally parachute with everyone else but I see none of them. I reckon you get h1z1 if you want a fun fast pace game. This game feels more live a pve because of the amount of times I lose health crashing into tree that don't exist. This game is buggy almost as buggy as h1z1. I wish I didn't get this game.

But I honestly cant recommend it when its so broken.Its probably the most broken game I have on my Steam right now.Theres a lot of problems with this game but the worse one is when the game just decides to freeze in a important moment like when you land on the ground and other players are really close to each other or when you open the menu.I dont know if its the server lagging or whatever and I dont care this needs to be fixed.I cant ing believe how this game is so popular and been out for a few months and it still have problems like this.Being "early access" game is no excuse to sell a broken game like this and never fix it.I was going to refund it but its actually fun when it works so heres hoping they fix the problems in future updates.

review: I'm not complaining about being a bad player. I get it. I'm not great and I admit it.My problem is that it takes forever to get suited up get to my destination then wonder if I should camp (which I hate) or get killed moving to the objective. Then once I die it is unsatisfying and feels more like I have been cheated on rather than outplayed.I'm sure they are not cheating but if you die you can't see who shot you or from where especially if they are a sniper. Even if I manage to get close to someone and shoot them several times with a shotgun first they simply turn around and single shot kill me . . . Every. Single. Time. Then start all over again.It is more exhausting than fun. I guess I should have purchased a more "arcade style" game but the initial reviews were so great I took the chance. Now I only wish I did not go past the refund time as I am stuck with it. I'll keep trying for a while I guess.

review: Tl DR 4/10 very little fun for solo players Trigger happy banning system Modern day FPS with battle royale mechanics strapped on Typical "if my games popular people will still play it when i lie" dev mentality Lacks content Solid gameplay Nothing SpecialI get im probably part of the 1% that doesnt like this game I get its in early access i get its only been out a few months but jeez is this game barebones as like in some ways the sort of unique battle royale gameplay makes up for it but after a few hours that initial gimmick starts to fade and the game starts to fall in line with other mundane shooters on PC such as the likes of CSGO yes im not particulary fond of that game either i mean for a small team i suppose its not half bad the gameplay graphics and sound are all pretty solid but the lack of both more than one game mode and more than one map really start to drive home the boredom that starts to settle after the first few hours and anyone pandering this its early access argument well they shouldnt have charged 26 bloody pounds for it when its only got one map but to give the game some praise the devs do fix server outages quickly when they happen if your looking for the same old shooters its perfect not an extroadinary amount of bugs the single map is a decent size minimal lag when playingAnother problem i have with the game is the dev team lying to the playerbases face about microtransactions the idiotic debate of "stream sniping" when someone really might not be watching a stream and just happen to bump into the streamer the bans for honking cars at streamers whoops i mean "harassment" and the devs saying they need money to fund a tournament when their games been in the top charts for months also i really dont get why everyone likes this game so much maybe im missing something but to me its just another modern day FPS with battle royale mechanics strapped on to it to make it appear unique in a already oversaturated market speaking of market if you didnt like the game that much at least you can get some of your money back on the marketplace if your lucky enough...

review: Potential to be a great game however it needs anti cheat. The amount of aimbots in the game is ever growing. As of now (in alpha) I cannot recommend.as 21/5 There have been more instances of people being able to open doors silently and instances of people taking 6 shotgun shells at point blank and surviving.33% of the time it fails everytime. 1 in 3 games results in server crashes. Would be good for them to concentrate on the basic stuff and get that right first. But they seem to keep adding things to keep the cash flow going first and losing the original players.So it is now official it has been announced that this game uses RNG to determine hits.... in an FPS! Just let that sink in for a while.Came back after 18 month game still cannot tell tell the difference between game controller and keyboard. Got better thing to do than keep unplugging controller whenever I want to play this for a bit.

review: This game is unplayable. Send all the hate you want but I am not going to bandwagon and say its good. The gameplay is obviously good but the graphics and proformance is unacceptable. With my GTX 980 I still have trouble getting good frames. I had to play with the settings a lot. Even then the game looks super blurry cartoony and laggy. I don't always complain about grahpics but the settings in this game make it unplayable. With Medium high settings you can't see more than 100 feet before it looks like you opened your eyes underwater. In its current state I can not recommend this. I am going to refund this and I'll buy it when the graphics are up to 2017 standards. pre 2010 grahpics are even better than this. If you don't wanna believe me buy the game and watch at how disapointed you get.

review: It's fun for a bit but then it just... it gets irritating. Not even because of some of the game killing bugs just some of the dynamics of the "game play" become downright lame.First off.... there are some game kiling bugs. While it is known you can't currently shoot through walls or doors or really even windows because bullets will bounce off the bars.... more often than not if there is some sort of railing between you your bullets will bounce off it.Third person viewing is an IRITATINGLY stupid advantage in this game. Hide behind a corner and who ever camps the longest will generally win.SPEAKING of campers... there is nothing more irritating than spending 5 10 minutes looting only to be killed because some pansy is hiding in an unlooted house not moving at all. Takes the fun out of the game. Then there's falling through floors. Finding a gun with no ammo or ammo with no gun. The game ruining lag. Getting stuck in your parachute for 10 minutes while everyone else hits the ground.I dunno I really enjoyed playing it a bit but I can't recommend it anymore.... it's fun for about a month and then you start getting decent at it and get ridiculously frustrated at the BS and the bugs that haven't been fixed.

I hope Pubg would reconsider their ban on my account as soon as possible because these times of fun doesn't last forever. I would recommend all to come play Pubg to earn that Chicken Dinner.
