review: Update as of 27/08/2018 I'm a part of the Australian playerbase for PUBG and I regret to report that the active player base on our servers (OCE) is struggling at this time. Additional maps and modes along with a general drop in player numbers has significantly increased match making times especially during off peak hours. Many Australian players will recommend that you play on other international servers but I do not see this as an ideal solution due to the decreased network performance from playing on oversea servers. I'm going to leave this review positive as it is more of a meta problem with our playerbase rather than an actual issue with the game but I would not recommend any Australian's purchase the game if they wish to play on Oceania servers.A One Hundred Player 'Last man standing' First and Third Person shooter in which you are dropped onto a large map to gather weapons ammo armour and other supplies in order to survive against your competition. Very enjoyable in short play sessions (matches typically go for around 30 minutes) and especially while playing with friends. The concept itself is repetitive but the size of the map and the inability to guess where another player might be keep things tense and dynamic.

I am sorry it gets such a bad rap. I have never seen a cheater and the amount of times I have lost out due to a bug/glitch/disconnect is neglible.Great game.Thank you!

review: This game has so much ahead of it but the devs went for microtransactions and milking the player before even addressing all the bugs and core issues with the game. Playing it before full release was great since you thought "Yeah there's some bugs but here in a while it'll be in 1.0 release and they'll have fixed those.." No not at all they added skins and cases like CS GO while it was still beta and then pushed full release while optimization was terrible. Most of that has fairly settled optimization has gotten better but there's no doubt that at least in NA much of the player base has left to due the lack of cooperation from the devs. As it sits now the game is fairly decent with a lot of the game breaking issues for the most part minimalized. Although I cannot reccomend this game Fortnite as cringey as it bay be has a lot more players and is much more optimized and they actually listen to when fans say something needs to be addressed.

review: (Check the Hours)So in the beginning I would of considered this game done even months ago. It was already at a better point than Day Z was. With That Being Said It's gotten WORSE Since Initial EARLY ACCESS. Updates that constantly go backwards With the Following Constant crashing between me and all the people i play with for NUMEROUS different reasons ALL THE F'N Time. Clipping Issues Reward Boxes Not Showing Up Lobby Disconnects Leaderboard Issues BACKWARD PROGRESS since the release date.(I play Solo Due and Squad and by far Squad is the most troublesome because you have 3 4 people with seperate issues trying to start at the same time Such a Time and NIGHT WASTER)I own a ps4 (I know I'll get hate From all the kids who can afford 1 System so they defend the ONE their mommy built em) but one thing I love about Sony Online is that they dont let early access garbage onto thier store. For this particular reason. This game particularly delayed and microsft ate it up for early access on their non exclusive console. No End Date in site and With A Update System that seems to be regressing id either pass or wait for another Survival Clone.

review: Played it for 15 hours. The idea is good nice graphics beautiful atmosphere. I like this game. Actually this is the first game I have bought in ages. BUT only 40 FPS max (on very low settings) on my PC makes it almost Impossible to play!!! Currently live in China and play on Asian servers. The servers are laggy a bit. Developers should pay attention to that. BTW my PC is pretty powerful not the top gear but still must be enough to play on medium settings.My PC i7 5700 CPU 2.7GHz (8 cores)16 GB of RAM DDR4Nvidia GTX 950M 2GBAdditionally installed pretty good cooling and ventilation system. I really hope the developers will optimize the FPS problems soon. Cuz I've tried to change the video card setting for this game and still can not higher than 40 FPS. I would understand it if I put everything on High or Ultras but change setting to very low and still get such a low perfomance is pretty sad to see...Anyway I recommend this game because its gameplay is catchy. Will be awaiting for everything to be fixed.

review: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds interesting in that it requires a good amount of time to sink into it. Like you'll spend nearly 30 minutes in the game in one match sometimes without finding a single other guy. It can be really fun at times especially when you run into a guy and end up having a shootout while running in between buildings and stuff like that. Other times you'll get really annoyed getting realy good gear just to get sniped in the back from some rando that's across the map.If you're into the hunger games style royale type of gameplay this game is a definite recommendation. It takes elements from many of those games and combines it into (mostly) the best version at least in my opinion. However if you're not a fan of that type of game you will most likely HATE this.Overall there are some really good elements as well a good amount of "meh" elements that make this game a mixed bag. I would reccomend at least trying the game out or trying a free competitor before you buy but if you end up enjoying it you'll get a LOT of fun out of it.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game is intense fun with heart pounding moments. This doesn't mean the game is perfect or with out issue however.Pros graphics gun mechanicsloot and attachment systemhealth systemthe map in generalparachutinggun and veichle soundsSquad Duo and Solo gameplayCons poor optimization as of nowoccasionally stuttering when loading texturesoccasional crashingoccasional hit reg issuesThis being said the DEV team is extremely transparent and determined to make this game great so i have full faith in the future of this game. But don't buy in now expecting perfection but it is a hell of a lot of fun.

review: I like to go back and edit my reviews of games as the developers update their games. I rated it would not recommend after they unveiled FixPUBG.Weeks later at 9/20/2018 Would Not Recommed.Pros Slightly fewer Cheaters. Cool Guns. Cons Still Buggy. Poor Optimization. Microtransactions in order to use in game currency (They're not even seperate systems!!). Events only on weekends and no chance to play 100 person war mode unless the bluehole Masters decide we plebs are worth it for three days at a time.Final note If I could trade someone twenty bucks to take this game back from me I would. This is the kind of shooter you could expect to see littering the local game store trade in bin if it were physical media.

review: PUBG's trailer might make the came a little more dramatic as it is but do remember this is still early access.The graphics are gritty which fits the game typeThe gunplay feels good on the most part with the exception of pistols perhaps being a little too ineffectiveThe zone not toxic gas this time is mysterious and is quite fair the first ones you can manage through without much issue.And the current Map is okay but there's a lot flatland so being without a vehicle at times and having to run across an open field is riskyThis is a tacticool shooter so standing still to fire your gun is best for accuracy compared to side side stepping &gt stop &gt shoot ofc something like CS which... doesn't work for the most part in PUBG.But some meh sidesIt's early access the netcode needs some finishing touches tick rate and such serverside issues exists so laggy players will hit you even though you ran behind cover. So high ping players around corners are still a nightmare.The weapon variety is a bit low but it's mostly because there's a lack of specialised guns Currently there's only one DMR No "insane" shotgun SPAS 12 to excell at destroying cover or cars.Some iron sights are really bad the AKM being a prime example of something you want a sight on asp and pistols in general.My number one question is how we're not able to throw attachments to make noise or how shooting a gasoline can doesn't cause it explode / start a fire.Fire also isn't as effective as you'd think by being on fire you'd expect the enemy unable to aim rapidly losing health and die but instead it's something similar just do a weak area denial with a damage over time effect.And Smoke is clientside of all things.... a huge demerit for smoke grenade usageAll in all the basics are here and it makes for quite a good game the one more mentality is addictive for solo play and squad play is some of the most fun I've had in ages.

review: THE GOOD the game get more and more fun as lesser players remain. the intensity builds up fast. require strategic positioning and teamwork. (if squad/duo) great game to play with your friends. sufficient regional servers a good attempt to reduce lag for everyone. consistent patch/update from devs.TO BE IMPROVED although with varying plane direction and drop points it would far better with more maps to add even more fun to this game. "1st person only" mode can make the game more "fair" and intense! would like to play it. more optimization needed. i'm setting the graphics to ultra low like everyone else to see people hiding in the grass/bush to enjoy the game more beautifully would only be a disadvantage to yourself. Hopefully there is an upgrade to the textures as to make the game a little more "pretty" for everyone? more weapons. different squad sizesThis game is so fun and already doing so well considering its still in early access.Its a great game to enjoy with friends.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Love the game! Very addicting. My one problem is the sniper ish category and the Shotguns. If youre going for realism with one hit headshots or one hit shotgun the balance feels off when you put 15 SMG bullets or 10 AR bullets into the person who gets you one shot with a shotgun.The armor also feels pretty arbitrary. I have never noticed a difference of damage taken with armor. I have gotten one hit headshot with lvl 1 &amp 2 helmet as well as no helmet. I have been 1/2 shot with a shotgun with a lvl 1&amp 2 Vest. Just would like more consistency or reason for picking up/using items. If you watch the kill feed the top 10 almost always consists of people with Kar98 AWM and SKS. This makes lasting to the end feel a little more like RNG than skill. Anyways still love the game... just wish these things could be addressed soon.

review: The issue seemed to be video card realated for me. My original card was correct for the game but I upgraded to a GeForce 1050 TI and now it runs very well. Changing my review to reflect that.The game itself as I said is a lot of fun and with Microsoft backing them now I hope for some more great features and additions in the future. ORIGINAL REVIEWAfter seeing multiple people playing this game online I gave it a go. I wish I had waited. I have yet to have a match load at all let alone even get to play. I can get to the starting island with seconds left on the countdown and to the plane. On the way down to the main game island I freeze up all the time and get "lag detected" constantly on a 115Mbps download / 25 Mbps upload line. If I do get to the ground it looks like I'm in a gingerbread land all the buildings look like they were drawn with watercolors and I cannot see doors vs walls. I've read online how to tweak settings and such with no luck at all.I do realize this is in early access but something has to be up for me to have such a poor experience. Then you see that Microsoft is wrapped up rights to the Xbox One for this game. MS better put some big time help into this or it'll never be released.Once (if) they get the issues worked out I'll give it another try. For now time to uninstall. (

review: The bad things Horrible optimizations. textures take ages to load fps drops bad fps even on low settings (i have 1060oc). I think it's biggest con is the unaceptable long time the teextures take to load after having landed some times it's faster then others but alot of the time you will be killed because you can't enter buildings to loot and get gear to fight back sometimes it just freezes when you enter the inventory while textures are loading. and combine this with 1 fps and you got the perfect recipie for loosing the game.(luckly this only happens at the beginning of the game but not evrytime sometimes it will load just fine with the exception of huge fps drops) The good things I think it's a great "just one more game" simulator i love the gameplay when it's working fine and once the game has loaded the textures you wont encounter many other problems other than some fps drops here and there. Even with all the problems I've mentioned i would recommend this game.

review: Pros Amazing game that will get you addicted. Lots of thinking goes into how you actually win the game. Weapon sounds feels great in game Game physics will make you burst out laughing at times. Big map with lots of places to loot at You have to manually upgrade your weapon by attachments you find in game. Shotgun headshots with 100m distance with choke attachment Separate ques for solo/duo/squad Game developers seems to care about making the game good enough in the future.Cons Servers are too laggy for some (like me). I get frame stutters all the time even though I run good end graphics card + cpu. The developers have reported problems in their core engine which causes this. Game crash at times Force field circle is ridiculous. It's meant to force people to fight and not camp in every corner of the map. What it's actually doing is killing people who don't have cars to get to the new circle (if u get unlucky RNG spawn of the circle). And its sometimes moving WAY too fast it's like moving 5x faster than you could possibly run. So you sometimes have to use up all your meds just to heal up the field dmg in these situations. Some have sound problems. Like my friend who can only hear someone shooting if he is looking at the person. 3rd person is a nice idea but is a bit too overpowered and unfair. You can literally see someone run up to you in 3rd person while they have 0 idea that you are sitting behind cover and just 1 shot them with shotgun before they have time to react.Basically if you can't take dying to stupid which you can't do anything about this game isn't for you. If you can take it at times then you will have lots of fun. (Say if you are unlucky someone will just shoot you down from way afar with a sniper lag as i mentioned crashes random glitches if you are unlucky).
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Coming from H1Z1 I had my worries about this game. Played almost 7 hours straight yesterday and so far I love this game. The graphics the feel being able to equip sights to your guns and all the other attachments its just a complete 180 from KotK. I played a few solos learned the hard way that vehicles will actually kill you if they hit you unlike h1z1 where the vehicle roadkill's are random. Being able to pick where you jump and deploy your parachute is a nice feature. Although the very last 100 feet or so could be faster. Joined into a squad as a solo player and a guy from a group of 3 (matt1812) betrayed me so I guess you still can't get away from that. Got to use a large different group of weapons each feeling unique in its own way. Not having to worry about the whole get shot take cover vehicle rolls up full speed and then get shotgunned to the face is nice. The only big I found and it seems other have too is the launch one where you don't see your character. But all in all I love what I'm experiencing. Should it be $30? Atm I don't believe so but I don't regret paying it EDIT 05/14 so many people have bought this game with no work on servers its unplayable now due to lag and Desync. 5 games in a row killed behind walls. take what you want from it.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: The performance is pretty good doesn't budge from 60fps (vsync) and the graphics look really nice kind of like Far Cry.The sound effects are brilliant I was near a tree and someone hit the tree while trying to shoot me and I could actually hear the bullets hitting the wood! Great attention to detail.I would say the gameplay is very ARMA like and if that's your thing then I absolutely recommened you get this game 100% but I unfortunately hate ARMA and didn't really like PUBG either It was just no fun and too much frustration.I'm not sure exactly how many matches I've played so far maybe 10 15 and I've not found a single sniper rifle yet but I did find an M16 a few times and that's the best gun i've found so far.I died too many times without ever feeling like I accomplished anything. It's not a very fun game (not for me at least) and I found myself either getting killed by players or getting killed by the blue restriction circle thing.I will give it a few more tries but I can't see my opinions drastically changing anytime soon.I would like to give the game a middle rating but ya know what steam's like they haven't figured out how to program that in yet so I will have to give a thumbs down.TLDR Dying simulator 10/10

review: You will get your money out of this game.Look at the majority of negative reviews and youll see people talking about how bad the game is but have played for 50+ hours. Yes the game has its issues yes there is a LOT that still needs to be done.. But you will get your money worth out of this game. Youll spend $50 on a couple games of laser tag but if you play this for even 6 hours youve gotten your money worth. Tho I expect if you make it 6 hours youll be hooked. Great game that does need work but a whole of fun how it is in its current state too.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Putting asaide that Fornite is doing a WAY better job rewarding players with interesting cosmetics that are PERMANTE. Battlegrounds is still a pretty intense experience. However to say this game is King of the Battle Royale genre is quickly becoming a joke. If the Devs wish for this game to continue for the forseeable future they will have to REWORK their loot box system immensely. Either remove the inital cost of the game or make your cosmetics worth it because right now their cosmetics are terrible!So if you care nothing for progression just get in quickly and kill stuff this game does the job well.

review: 2nd Update Back to no communication played all day and not one Englishs speaking teammate on the NA server.1st Update They have fixed the communication issues buy away!This game is fun as hell! But there's currently one hold back. There are so many non english speaking players on the NA EU and OS servers that it has ruined a lot of the fun. It is difficult to find a random squad who can remotely understand you and the general game chatter has significantly decreased.Also thanks to the new killcams and replays it's easy to see how many non NA located players are using hacks.These few setbacks are ruining the core of what makes this game so amazing.Until this problem is solved I must give this a "Not Recommended" status to show the developers I care about these issues. Yet I will continue to play and encourage my friends to buy this game. If these problems aren't solved soon I can garuntee I will become fed up sooner rather than later. But whatever they already have my one time payment.

review: This game oh my this game is the most fun in a multiplayer game in a while If you are on edge about buying this game i would say a few things first this game is ment to be played with friends (Play how you want around or kill each other) and is the most fun i have had on a online video game because there is so much uniqeness and is 100x better than H1Z1 and i would highly recomend it (If you have people to play with)

review: A very bugfree game. I didnt go through walls like Harry Potter on Platform 9 3/4 at all. Trust me. In this 5 hours of playtime that I have I had the most fun in ages (no sarcasm). I must say it's a great game. But like I said very bugfree. (Gastation walls don't exist in this game yet).

title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I would say it has been a long time since I have considered myself a "gamer". PUBG has brought me back from being a responsible adult/parent to an individual dead set on wiping out all my competition in this game. Heck even in team play I find myself with an itchy trigger finger when my teammates step in front of my scope. Pundits may say the graphics aren't great or the single map is too limited but the core premise of the game is solid and you can easily find youself engrossed in its gameplay. Very highly recommended.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: So we all want to be the best person in the world. Well unfortunately that is impossible to achieve in a world of haters! So this game is the closest thing to that vision if you turn a blind eye to the violence. What can I say! This game is awesome!! Graphics decent and the idea is great. Think of the film Predators. This is basically that film in the flesh. Go play it and look out for it coming to consoles!!!!!!
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
